welcome_message_body: Welcome to Kawashiri, Japan! Known for its stunning cherry blossoms and historic temples, we invite you to explore our charming city and immerse yourself in its rich culture and traditions. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Itami Airport, serving domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Itami Airport, serving some domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport with no time limit.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The secondary terminal for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Kansai International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for low-cost carriers and some international flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited connectivity in certain areas.
